comments.body: Does this need to be declared in the global scope?

Thank you for your review. I think it is necessary.

Hexo provides a plugin system. Plugin works inside hexo. Then global value `hexo` is provided by hexo.
https://hexo.io/docs/themes#scripts

* TypeScript  
  https://github.com/OpportunityLiu/hexo-renderer-ts/blob/master/index.ts
* JavaScript  
  https://github.com/hexojs/hexo-deployer-git/blob/master/index.js

If there is any other good way, please let me know. I fill follow it.
